page.title: 07MEMORIES OF MR.BISHOP.
page.content: {Mr. Bishop}has lived in{Broad Town}all his life. He is{70 years old.}There used to be a regular bus service in the village it went to town{3 times}a day except{Wednesday.}On a{Saturday}it went{4 times,}in the{morning, {afternoon, evening}and at{night}(if people wanted to go to the{cinema}or {theatre.) { }In{Broad Town}there is a lane called{Horns lane}it was called{Horns {lane}because a man used to blow a{post {horn}to tell the people that the{stage {coach}was coming.{Mr. Bishop}can remember the{first car}in this {village.}When it went past the school {every one}would watch it go past at its speed of{10mph.}But it nearly always came back being pulled by a {horse.}This was in the{1920's.
